snippet: The new college football postseason system starting in 2014 will have six games as originally planned, but now a spot in the marquee bowls will be reserved for the best team from a group of five conferences.
abstract: College football postseason starting in 2014 will feature six games as originally planned, but now a spot in marquee bowls will be reserved for best teams from five smaller conferences--Big East, Mountain West, Conference USA, Sun Belt and Mid-American.
lead_paragraph: The new college football postseason system starting in 2014 will have six games as originally planned, but now a spot in the marquee bowls will be reserved for the best team from a group of five conferences.
